| History                 =  The Warriors of Krieger Sect are one of the strongest vampire sects, who are led by [[Legate (Earth-616)|Legate]]. They are rivals of the [[Claw Sect (Earth-616)|Claw Sect]]. They live in an unassailable mountain fortress according to the [[Anchorite Sect (Earth-616)|Anchorite Sect]].
 
The Warriors of Krieger Sect were one among the many sects that attended the once in a century vampire gathering. When [[Xarus (Earth-616)|Xarus]], son of [[Vlad Dracula (Earth-616)|Dracula]], assassinated his father, the Warriors of Krieger turned against Xarus and returned to their fortress where they were attacked by the [[Nosferatu Sect (Earth-616)|Nosferatu Sect]] and [[Charniputra Sect (Earth-616)|Charniputra Sects]]. They were massacred by both forces along with their leader Legate.
